inventory.equipment_text: Quarterstaff, Dagger, Component Pouch, Scholar's Pack, Spellbook, Bottle of Black Ink, Quill, Small Knife, Letter from a Dead Colleague, Common Clothes, 10 gp

roleplay.personality_traits: I use polysyllabic words that convey the impression of great erudition. I've read every book in the world's greatest libraries.
roleplay.ideals: Knowledge. The path to power and self-improvement is through knowledge.
roleplay.bonds: I've been searching my whole life for the answer to a certain question.
roleplay.flaws: I am easily distracted by the promise of information.
roleplay.feats_and_traits: Elf Weapon Training, Fey Ancestry, Trance, Arcane Recovery, Spell Mastery
roleplay.features_and_traits: Arcane Recovery: Once per day when you finish a short rest, you can recover some of your spell slots. Spell Mastery: You have achieved such mastery over certain spells that you can cast them at will.
roleplay.proficiencies_and_languages: Common, Elvish, Draconic, Abyssal, Arcana, History, Investigation, Insight
roleplay.allies: The Arcane University, The Starweaver Family
roleplay.backstory: A brilliant young wizard who left the Arcane University to seek ancient knowledge and magical artifacts in the wider world.
roleplay.treasure: A mysterious crystal orb that seems to contain swirling starlight.
